column4: Hi all. I Think I've got a serious problem: I cannot see the login dialog window. Sometimes Its like the system just stops before showing it without freezing, and sometimes I can can navigate using the arrows keys, select my username by pressing enter, type my pwd and voila! all this without seeing any response on the screen untill I'm loged in. What can I do? TIA!
ive got 2 displays connected to my display. I just tried switching users and I could see login dialog on my regular display only. Should I try restarting?
i meant to say "...2 displays connected to my video card..."
